data.eml:eml: Two eriophyoid mites (Acari: Eriophyoidea) associated with Ilex paraguariensis from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ferla, Noeli Juarez (2017): Two eriophyoid mites (Acari: Eriophyoidea) associated with Ilex paraguariensis from Brazil. Zootaxa 4324 (2): 363-370, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4324.2.8
